CustomField.formula: "Step 1: DO NOT create Excise Tax Receipts for Type 11 or Type 12 Licensees." & BR() & "Step 2: Excise Tax CANNOT be discounted. DELETE line(s) that include PRODUCER-DISCOUNT." & BR() & "Step 3: Excise Tax is due upon delivery. Payment terms is always COD unless specifically requested or granted. " & BR() & "Step 4: Once Excise Tax is received, Driver to update Excise Tax Acceptance Date." & BR() & "Step 5: Finance to reconcile and update Payment Form and Reconciliation Date"
CustomField.label: Important Message
